data.title: CGC Grading Scales
data.meta_description: Learn about CGC grading standards for each numeric grade for comic books, trading cards and other collectibles by referencing the CGC Grading Scales.
data.text:
Restoration Grading Scale

CGCâ€™s Restoration Grading Scale is a transparent system that is much more descriptive and accurate than before. Every type of restoration found on each book will be individually graded for quantity and quality, with a cumulative score determining the final restoration grade assigned.

Conservation Repairs

Conservation repairs are performed with the intent of preserving the structural or chemical integrity of a comic book using professional techniques and materials. It excludes aesthetic repairs such as color touch and piece fill. All conserved grades must satisfy the CGC quality scale of "A" and quantity scale of "1".

Tear seals

Spine split seals

Reinforcement

Some cover or interior cleaning (water or solvent)

Staples cleaned or replaced

Some leaf casting

Materials Used for Conservation Repairs:

Rice paper

Wheat glue

Vintage staples

Archival tape
